analysis_racial: Thomas, Santiago and Bailey is promoting racial diversity by encouraging candidates of Filipino heritage to apply, aiming to enhance cultural perspectives and creativity within their team.
text:
Company Background:
Thomas, Santiago and Bailey is a leading creative agency specializing in developing cutting-edge digital solutions. With a reputation for excellence, we are committed to fostering an inclusive and vibrant environment that embraces diversity in all forms.

Job Title: Senior Web Designer / Art Director

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Web Designer / Art Director to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web design, user experience, and creative direction. This role requires an individual who can bring innovative ideas and artistic excellence to our diverse projects.

Responsibilities:
- Lead and manage web design projects from concept to completion.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure cohesive visual representation.
- Develop and maintain design systems and guidelines.
- Mentor junior designers and provide constructive feedback.
- Stay updated on the latest design trends and technologies.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Web Design, or a related field.
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in web design or art direction.
- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, and other design tools.
- Strong portfolio showcasing creative and diverse design work.
- Excellent communication and leadership skills.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Inclusive workplace culture that celebrates diversity.

Diversity and Inclusion:
We are committed to enhancing our team’s diversity. In our effort to create a more inclusive environment, we strongly encourage applications from individuals of Filipino heritage to enrich our team’s cultural perspectives and creativity.
